title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the desired features, user personas, expected outcomes, data sources, integrations, security considerations, and scalability requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, integration points, and considerations for scalability, maintainability, and performance.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the onboarding experience, ensuring a seamless and intuitive experience.

title: Implement AI-driven Personalization
description: Develop the AI algorithms and models responsible for personalizing the onboarding experience based on user data.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for user data, onboarding content, and personalization models.

title: Implement Integration and API
description: Develop the necessary APIs and integration points for the system to communicate with other systems and data sources.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the project, ensuring smooth and automated deployments.

title: Implement Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant regulations and standards.

title: Create Test Suite and QA Process
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite and quality assurance process to ensure the system's functionality and reliability.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system's architecture, components, and APIs for future reference and maintenance.
